body:
Dear Nancy Garcia,

Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your warranty claim. We appreciate the time you've taken to share your concerns with us, and we're here to help you through this process.

We've received your claim and would like to acknowledge receipt of your request. We understand that you're experiencing issues with your product, and we're committed to resolving this matter as soon as possible.

After reviewing your claim, our team has identified that it requires further specialist review to ensure an accurate assessment and resolution. Our specialists will carefully examine the details of your case, and we'll be in touch with you within the next 24-48 hours to provide an update on the status of your claim.

Please be assured that your case is being prioritized, and we're working diligently to resolve this matter as quickly as possible. If you have any questions or concerns in the meantime, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our dedicated customer service team is available to assist you.

For your reference, your claim ID is CLAIM-20260121-180713. You can use this number to track the progress of your claim on our website or by contacting us directly.

If you need to speak with someone about your claim, please feel free to call us at 1-800-HAIR-DRY (1-800-424-7392) or email us at support@hairdryerco.com. We're available Monday through Friday, 9am to 5pm EST.

Thank you for your patience and understanding as we work through this process. We appreciate your loyalty to our brand, and we're committed to delivering the highest level of service to you.

Sincerely,
The Customer Service Team
Hairdryer Co.
